item.title: Nginx - 1 - 单页面静态网站配置
item.description: 刷新页面，默认重定向到Index.html 静态目录(static)，找不到默认404 server { listen 8080; server_name localhost; client_max_body_size 10m; client_header_buffer_size 256k; large_client_header_buffers 4 256k; root /opt/vue; location /faq { default_type text/html; return 200 '<!--faq-->'; } location /static/ { try_files \$uri \$uri =404; } location / { add_header Cache-Control 'no-cache'; try_files \$uri \$uri /index.html; } } 附加问题 400 Bad Request Request Header Or Cookie Too Large
